about_the_game:
Tactics Unlimited is a modern 3D football game that brings fresh energy to the genre by combining strategy, management, and on-field action into an immersive experience. With its realistic graphics, players are treated to lifelike depictions of stadiums, players, and in-game dynamics.

Master Tactical Team Management

In Tactics Unlimited, pre-match strategy is as important as in-game execution. Players have full control over team setup, including formations, player roles, and specific tactics. Adjustments can be made during the match, allowing for real-time influence on the outcome. These strategic choices are crucial to outmaneuvering opponents and achieving victory.

Intuitive And Engaging Gameplay

The controls are designed to be both accessible and responsive, allowing players of all skill levels to enjoy the game. You can move players, pass, shoot, and defend with ease, but there’s a tactical depth that demands careful consideration of individual player skills. This mix of fast-paced action and strategic depth ensures a consistently rewarding gameplay experience.

Surprise Your Opponent With Action Cards

Each Action Card offers unique advantages, enabling players to manipulate key moments in the game. For instance, the Action Card Energy Recovery can be used to restore stamina to an exhausted player, ensuring that your star player stays on the field instead of being substituted. Meanwhile, the Action Card Double Potential boosts the chances of a successful play, increasing the likelihood of critical actions such as goal attempts or defensive maneuvers going in your favor.

This innovative feature adds a dynamic twist to the already strategic gameplay, allowing players to outthink and outmaneuver their opponents with the right cards played at the right time.

Tactics Unlimited places you in the role of a focused and strategic trainer, guiding your team to success through precise tactical decisions and player management.

Total Focus On Sporting Success

As the trainer, your primary responsibility is to lead your team to victory. You can fully focus on tactics, formations, and player management. Your strategic choices directly influence the outcome of matches, placing your focus firmly on outmaneuvering your opponents and mastering the art of football.

Turn-Based, Tactical Match Play

The core of Tactics Unlimited lies in its turn-based, tactical match system. This style of play requires careful planning and execution of each move, ensuring that every decision has meaningful consequences. The game challenges you to think ahead, anticipate your opponent’s moves, and adapt your strategies on the fly.

Simplified Club Management

While Tactics Unlimited provides some elements of club management, these aspects are simplified to keep the focus on the sporting and tactical experience. Economic development, facility upgrades, and other managerial tasks are streamlined, so they don’t interfere with your primary goal: winning on the field. This simplified approach ensures that your experience remains engaging and tactically driven.

Comprehensive Player And Tactics Training

You’ll have access to in-depth player and tactics training, allowing you to fine-tune your team’s performance. Tailor your training sessions to improve specific skills or adapt tactics that suit your style of play. With the right preparation, you’ll be able to mold your team into a winning squad.

Player Skills & Action Cards

In addition to tactics, you can also develop your players’ skills to unlock special abilities and moves. For example, teaching a player the Duel Skill increases their chances of winning one-on-one battles, while the Header Skill makes attackers more dangerous in aerial situations. These skills make your team more individualized and effective in various game scenarios.

The Action Cards further add to the strategic depth of the game. These cards allow you to create game-changing moments by playing them at critical points. For instance, using the Energy Recovery card can prevent your key player from being substituted, keeping them in the game when it matters most. Meanwhile, the Double Potential card boosts your chances of success for crucial plays.

Transfer Market, Scouting And Youth Management

Though club management is streamlined, Tactics Unlimited still offers a robust transfer market and scouting system. You can scout for new talent, manage transfers, and develop youth players, ensuring long-term success and growth for your team. Building a strong pipeline of future talent keeps your club competitive over the course of multiple seasons.

Infrastructure & Personnel Management

In addition to team management, you also oversee the development of your club’s infrastructure and personnel. However, this area is intentionally simplified to ensure it doesn’t detract from the focus on tactical gameplay. Nevertheless, it can provide significant advantages, such as hiring more qualified staff.

Sponsors, Marketing, Fans and More

Even though the focus is on your tactical decisions, the game includes features such as sponsor management, marketing activities, and fan interaction. These aspects contribute to enhancing your club’s reputation and finances without overwhelming you with detailed micromanagement tasks.

Single- & Multiplayer Modes

Whether you prefer playing against AI teams in solo mode or testing your skills against human opponents in multiplayer, Tactics Unlimited offers both options. Each mode provides a different level of challenge, keeping the gameplay fresh and engaging, no matter how you choose to play.

Modding & Editors

For players who enjoy customization, Tactics Unlimited offers modding and editing tools. You can tailor the game to your preferences, edit players or clubs, integrate several own images, and even develop your own unique leagues and competitions.

With its balance of tactical depth, player development, and streamlined management, Tactics Unlimited offers a rich and immersive football experience for both casual players and dedicated strategists. Whether you’re focusing on outwitting the AI, facing off against real opponents, or building a championship team, every aspect of the game is designed to provide a captivating and rewarding experience.

legal_notice: Tactics Unlimited © 2023 by 2tainment GmbH. Supported by: Federal Ministry for Economic Affairs and Climate Action on the basis of a decision by the German Bundestag
name: Tactics Unlimited

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: AMD / Intel processor running at 2.6 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD/NVIDIA dedicated graphics card, with at least 4 GB of dedicated VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated or dedicated DirectX 11 compatible soundcard
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: AMD / Intel processor running at 3.3 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD/NVIDIA dedicated graphics card, with at least 8 GB of dedicated VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated or dedicated DirectX 11 compatible soundcard

short_description: Lead your team from the very bottom to the top of international football. Use turn-based gameplay to strategically influence matches and surprise your opponents. Also, focus on management: player transfers, youth development, or the expansion of your infrastructure.
supported_languages:
English*, German*, French*
*languages with full audio support
